response.original_title: The Making of How to Train your Dragon - Finding the Story
response.overview: The Chronicles of Creation of the Movie. This film about creation is a unique and valuable footage. You will see how Chris Sanders and Dean DeBlois created How to Train Your Dragon from the beginning. Very, very interesting film for any HtTYD fan. In the film you even can see John Powell playing song "Where's Hiccup?".
response.title: The Making of How to Train your Dragon - Finding the Story
